articles.author: Steven Goff
articles.title: USMNT falls to Panama in chaotic Copa America group play clash - The Washington Post
articles.description: Playing a man down for more than 70 minutes, U.S. still grabs early lead but was unable to hang on in a foul-filled 2-1 loss.
articles.content: ATLANTA Tim Weah is usually as cool and graceful on the soccer field as off it, but in a moment of madness Thursday, the 24-year-old winger put the U.S. national team in a terrible spot. And because … [+5339 chars]
